title: Armed and dangerous
content: President Bush. Photographer: Dan Chung A poll published this morning in the Guardian reveals that America's closest ally views the president as a greater threat to world peace than either Kim Jong-il or Mahmoud Ahmedinejad - the leaders of two-thirds of George Bush's infamous "axis of evil". Sixty-nine per cent of British respondents, meanwhile, felt Bush's foreign policy has made the world less safe. What do you think?
summary:
President Bush.
Photographer: Dan Chung A poll published this morning in the Guardian reveals that America's closest ally views the president as a greater threat to world peace than either Kim Jong-il or Mahmoud Ahmedinejad - the leaders of two-thirds of George Bush's infamous "axis of evil".
Sixty-nine per cent of British respondents, meanwhile, felt Bush's foreign policy has made the world less safe.
What do you think?
